group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Written informed consent was obtained from the parents of all the participants enrolled in this project (#43309030), which was approved by the Institutional Biomedical Ethics Committee of Umm Al-Qura University. The study was performed by the declaration of the National Committee of Biomedical Ethics at King Abdulaziz City for Sciences and Technology (KACST) (ExternalRef removed).

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Written informed consent was obtained from the parents of all study participants to publish the results.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.

funder.name: Institute of Scientific Research, Umm Al-Qura University

publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
